summary:
More than 13 years of experience in manual testing, automation testing of Web-based and Client Server application. Conversant with testing strategies such as Unit testing, Integration testing, Regression testing, Smoke tests and System testing. Very good hands-on Agile and Scrum.  Certified SCRUM Master.

Proficiency in defining, developing and executing Test Cases
Experience in both Localization and Internationalization Testing, 

Extensive experience in Manual Testing and Black Box Testing,	Creating and maintaining scripts for Automation Testing, writing testplans, Experience in Testing Client / Server and Web Based Application, Involved in Functionality Testing, GUI Testing, Regression Testing, Performance Testing and User Acceptance Testing, 

Knowledge of Six Sigma, ISO and CMM quality Models, Good hands on experience in Agile Methodology, 

Good hands on experience in writing estimations & Hot Fix processes.

Installing, configuring and testing of  Lotus Domino, VMWare , IIS, SQL, CITRIX XenApp, MFXP, SQL, TIVOLI connector, HP-OVO connectors, DELL open manager, Winos, HP Open View and IBM director 

Tremendous experience in windows configuration and installation.

Good Knowledge in TeamTrack ,eBiz, Test Director, VSS, QTP 8.2 and QTP 9.2, Selenium

Fair understanding of SDLC and STLC Models, Knowledge of test automation framework like Keyword Driven Frame Work and functional decomposition framework,

awards.title: Going to Extra Mile
awards.description: Award for working for the modules IIS, MFXP\XenApp in NetIQ project

profile_positions.description:
Worked on Incident Management, Problem Management, Workflow, Notify Engine,  Reporting and Performance Analytics modules.

ServiceNow Performance Analytics puts the power of data in the hands of the stakeholders and subject matter experts—workers, owners, and executives—who are responsible for successful service delivery.

With PA you can anticipate trends, prioritize resources, deliver automation and self service, drive toward continual service improvement and align service with overall business goals.

Notify enables organizations with a Twilio account to send notifications using text and voice messages. It also allows conference calls between ServiceNow users to enable quick communications.
When Notify is active, you can configure ServiceNow to automatically generate and send notifications to selected contacts, for instance when a new incident alert is raised in the incident alert management process.

Users with the notifynow_admin role can set properties and monitor message and conference call activities. Notify has been implemented for use within incident alert management.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software QA Engineer

profile_positions.description:
The NetIQ AppManager Suite delivers comprehensive systems management, including monitoring, reporting & analysis, diagnostics and resolution. It is designed to manage a variety of components – from physical hardware to server applications to end-user response time. NetIQ Appmanager is a client server based application, which mainly gives the visibility of  many software and hardware products like VM Ware ,Lotus Domino, IIS, SQL, Winos ,HP Open View, DELL Open Manager & IBM director .

NetIQ Appmanager has many products like System Management, Security Management, and Configuration Control & VoIP Management. The product supports different plug ins like HP-OVO connectors, DELL open manager, TIVOLI connectors.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Oracle - Siebel CRM

Oracle’s Siebel CRM is an Oracle product, market leader in CRM (Customer Relationship Management) domain. It enables organizations to transform the customer experiences. CRM is an integrated approach to identifying, acquiring, and retaining customers. By enabling organizations to manage and coordinate customer interactions across multiple channels, departments, lines of business, and geographies, CRM helps organizations maximize the value of every customer interaction and drive superior corporate performance. It is able to manage all customer touch points like email, phone, fax, web or in the field.

Siebel provides broadly two flavors of applications Siebel HOR(Horizontal), SIA(Siebel Industry Applications).HOR is general for any industry or domain , SIA is specific to industry needs. Intern these are divided into 4 types of applications.  
      1. Employee Applications 
      2.Customer Applications 
      3.Mobile Solutions Applications 
      4.Partner Applications.
profile_positions.title: Test Engineer
